title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-4.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-4.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Subpart contains and describes the policies and
procedures governing resident telephone use to residents of facilities operated
by the Office of Children and Family Services (OCFS). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
171-4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
